traits.Flourish: The captain adds its Charisma modifier to the damage roll for its longsword attacks (included in the attack).
traits.Sea Legs: The captain has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.

actions.Multiattack: The captain makes two attacks: one with its hand crossbow and one with its longsword.
actions.Hand Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage if used with two hands.
